name: Zelda: The Wand of Gamelon
description: The King of Hyrule learns that his ally Duke Onkled is under attack by the evil forces of Ganon. He tells his daughter Zelda to send Link if he does not return from Gamelon in one month. When the King does not return, Zelda sends Link to Gamelon to find her father. Growing restless, Zelda, along with her aid Impa, travel to Gamelon to defeat Ganon and rescue the King.
